Class YarnInventory

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.glavovaa.yarninv.utils.inventory.YarnInventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Inventory
public class YarnInventory extends Object implements Inventory
Class representing the yarn inventory. Implements the Inventory interface and contains methods for adding, removing and adjusting yarn. Loads and saves the inventory to/from s JSON file.

    • mergeDuplicateYarns

      public void mergeDuplicateYarns()
      Method for merging yarns with the same name, brand and yarn weight. Traverses the entire inventory and merges all possible yarns.
